tool_description: The AirVantage® M2M Cloud simplifies M2M development by providing a seamless connection between devices, the M2M cloud and the enterprise. - See more at: http://www.sierrawireless.com/en/productsandservices/AirVantage_M2M_Cloud/How_It_Works.aspx
name: AirVantage M2M Cloud
title: AirVantage M2M Cloud

api_list.name: Historical raw datapoints
api_list.description: Get the historical values of a raw data for the system matching the unique identifier and the data id defined in the url. Most recent datapoints are returned first.  Limitations:  3 months 10000 values which means you cannot access a value older than 3 months or after the first 10000 values.

api_list.name: Find Systems
api_list.description: Returns a paginated list of systems with their complete details.  It is possible to restrain the result list using criteria parameters.  Returned systems are shown only with the following attributes uid, name, state, type, activityState, lastCommDate, commStatus, lastSyncDate, syncStatus To display more or less attributes, the fields parameter has to be set. Though system creation date is not publicly exposed, the default sort order is based on the creation date. More information about paging, filtering, and sorting here

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: uid, name, state, activityState, lastCommDate, commStatus, gateway, subscriptions, labels, applications, metadata, communication, data, heartbeat, statusReport, reports, lastSyncDate, syncStatus

api_list.name: List of messages
api_list.description: Retrieve the list of past messages. The uid, timestamp, protocol and datapoints count are retrieved. Duplicate data are counted.

api_list.name: Last datapoints
api_list.description: Get the last datapoints of the system matching the unique identifier of data defined in the url. If no data identifier is set, the last datapoint for all data will be retrieved.

api_list.name: Details of a message
api_list.description: Get message details which consist in its uid, timestamp, protocol, datapoints count and the data sent by the device during this message. Duplicate data are counted.

api_list.name: Historical aggregated datapoints
api_list.description: Get a temporal aggregation of data points for the system matching the unique identifier and the data id defined in the url. Most recent datapoints are returned first. Three months of data are available.
